sdata.e: A man who has never gone to school may steal from a freight car, but if he has a university education, he may steal the whole railroad.

sdata.e: Learning lessons from Europe, Japan has to switch its economic-oriented policy to a consumer-conscious one, in order to cope with the coming unprecedented aging society towards the 21st century.

sdata.j: もしあなたが↑話↑↓はなし↓の↑途中↑↓とちゅう↓と|か↑社交↑↓しゃ|こう↓の↑場↑↓ば↓で↑長↑↓なが↓い↑間↑↓かん↓↑黙↑↓だま↓っていると、アメリカ↑人↑↓じん↓はあなたに↑話↑↓はな↓させようと↑努力↑↓どりょく↓する。
sdata.e: If you are silent in a conversation or social situation for a long time, Americans will try to get you to talk.

sdata.j: ↑残念↑↓ざんねん↓なことに、↑他↑↓た↓の↑先進↑↓せんしん↓↑諸国↑↓しょこく↓と↑同様↑↓どうよう↓に、アメリカも↑高齢↑↓こうれい↓↑化↑↓|か↓↑社会↑↓しゃ|かい↓になりつつある。
sdata.e: Unfortunately, like other developed countries, America is graying.

sdata.e: Lord, I wonder what fool it was that first invented kissing.

sdata.j: ↑生↑↓う↓まれてはじめて↑良心↑↓りょうしん↓の↑呵責↑↓|かしゃ|く↓を↑感↑↓かん↓じましたが、そうする↑以外↑↓いがい↓にその↑場↑↓ば↓をしのぐ↑方法↑↓ほうほう↓はありませんでした。
sdata.e: For the first time in my life, I felt a pang of conscience, but there was no other way out.
